description: Position: Test Systems EngineerLocation: Tucson, AZ (on-site 5 days)  Project Duration: 12 months w/ possibility of extension or conversionRate: Negotiable Based on ExperienceSecurity Clearance: Secret Clearance Required About the RoleJoin Raytheon’s Test Equipment Engineering (TEE) organization, where innovation meets mission-critical execution. duration: 12 months w/ possibility of extension or conversion
